item.title: Hey Copilot, what about are my metadata?
item.description: In this blog post, I wanted to share with you a use case I came across regarding my recent experience with Copilot Studio. DISCLAIMER I’m not an “AI expert” by any means, just a developer who consumes AI services which is not quite the same :D. Context I recently started a proof of concept to evaluate Copilot capabilities using Copilot Studio.
